description: Enterprise techniques used by Molerats, ATT&CK group G0021 v1.0
name: Molerats (G0021)

techniques.comment: [Molerats](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0021) used the public tool BrowserPasswordDump10 to dump passwords saved in browsers on victims.
[Molerats](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0021) actors obtained a list of active processes on the victim and sent them to C2 servers.
[Molerats](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0021) has used forged Microsoft code-signing certificates on malware.
